My interpretation of this article:

You don‚Äôt need a violent coup or a hacked voting machines to overthrow democracy. 

You just need control of the algorithm.

This article provides more data showing how easy it is to manipulate humans on social media. 

These researchers rerouted the algorithm on Twitter to push some users toward ‚Äúantidemocratic attitudes and partisan animosity‚Äù. 

It only took 1 week to elicit changes that used to take 3 years.
